description: &&7[PicoHUD/WTHIT]&&r Hold &&7[&&r&&6ALT&&r&&7]&&r to show your &&3location&&r, the &&3time&&r, and information about what's in front of you.

&&7[Spyglass Improvements]&&r When you have a spyglass in your inventory, hold &&7[&&r&&6Z&&r&&7]&&r to zoom in on far away objects. You can use the mouse wheel to zoom in and out! Also, note that you can use a spyglass if it's anywhere in your inventory, not just on your hotbar. There's also a Trinket slot for it!
&&7[Noteable]&&r Press &&7[&&r&&6N&&r&&7]&&r to open your notes, where you can write things down for this world.

&&7[LambDynamicLights/ClientTweaks]&&r Held items like &&3Torches&&r will &&dlight up their surroundings&&r. Press &&7[&&r&&6F&&r&&7]&&r to swap one to your &&3off-hand&&r, where it can't be placed accidentally.

&&7[Reacharound]&&r When a &&3visual [- -] indicator&&r appears at the crosshair, you can place blocks on &&dnormally unreachable sides&&r - Useful for building &&dbridges, walls, and downward staircases&&r.
